step_feedback.feedback: Good job keeping your shoulders and elbows relatively stable. Focus on opening your fingers wide as instructed.
Your shoulder and elbow movements are improving. Continue to focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together as you push down.
You're doing well with the arm motion. Try to inhale and tighten your muscles more deliberately as you make a fist and push down.
Good extension and relaxation. Ensure you are exhaling fully as you stretch your arms back overhead.
Your shoulder and elbow alignment is good. Pay close attention to opening your fingers wide and fully relaxing as you extend your arms.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to stretch your arms overhead with fingers open, then make a fist while squeezing your shoulder blades. Exhale and relax as you return to the start.
